column4: Can someone tell me how I might add a request to have MSSQL compiled, by default in PHP5 for both the desktop and server versions going forward?
Have you filed a bug against the php5 package?
- I didn't know if this would be considered a 'bug' as opposed to just a request
Its still appropriate to log it on Launchpad against that package. It may be classified as 'wishlist' though.
